attributes.action: reject claims that expenses are covered by parlimentary privilege.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The claims that the offences related to Parlimentary Expenses are covered by Parlimentary Privilege should be rejected by the Parlimentary Authoritys.

That the MPs Elliot Morley, Jim Devine and David Chayter should supended from sitting in the House of Commons with immediate effect with payment of salary and expenses suspended until after their cases have concluded.

That the above mentioned MPs should have the final payments on leaving the House of Commons at the next election witheld until after their cases have concluded.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
